body_html: I think for the moment none of the functions in nn.functional are supposed to accept tensors, and only Variables. Automatically wrapping Tensors in functions is planned though, so it will be supported sometime in the future.
body_text: I think for the moment none of the functions in nn.functional are supposed to accept tensors, and only Variables. Automatically wrapping Tensors in functions is planned though, so it will be supported sometime in the future.
body: I think for the moment none of the functions in `nn.functional` are supposed to accept tensors, and only Variables. Automatically wrapping Tensors in functions is planned though, so it will be supported sometime in the future.
